spec_data.Name: pungi-utils
spec_data.Description:
These utilities work with finished composes produced by Pungi. They can be used
for creating unified ISO images, validating config file or sending progress
notification to Fedora Message Bus.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 20 Sep 2017 04:13:58 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Utilities for working with finished composes
